text: Ojo onhoe, ki ʙa pajomʙarii tu ʙovar nadorand dar zamin sajr namekunand, to ʙingarand, ki oqiʙati pesinijonason ci guna ʙudaast? Tavonoii onho va jodgorihoe, ki dar ruji zamin padid ovarda ʙudand, az inho ʙestar ʙud. Vale quvvat va ʙuzurgii tanu cismason ʙa onho foidae narasond. Sipas Alloh onhoro ʙa saʙaʙi gunohason ʙa azoʙ giriftor kard va az qahri Alloh onhoro nigahdorandae naʙud
